about_the_game:
Voice: Teacher 綿雨たべ子 Wataame Tabeko

◆ Story

Li Yuan made a wish on the night of the meteor rain and unexpectedly gave life to his sex doll, Meng. At first, Meng could only talk but could not move, and her body was still made of silicone. Under Li Yuan's attentive care, Meng's body could move, but to become a real person, the two of them still needed to continue to work hard.

Meng was like a newborn baby, curious about everything. She was also very dependent on Li Yuan. Li Yuan enjoyed this dependence very much. After all, Meng was a sex doll, and her sexual needs were extremely strong. Whenever she said erotic things seriously, Li Yuan would always get shy and excited.

After coming to life, Meng would inevitably develop many human characteristics. She would feel sorry for Li Yuan, who worked hard at work, but she would also imitate the people on TV to swear, be addicted to the Internet, etc. The way they are dealt with would determine the outcome of the two.

◆ Gameplay instructions

There are multiple choices in the main storyline, and each choice will affect the final ending.

And with the development of the plot, more interactive options will be gradually unlocked, from helping Meng [bath], enabling her to [eat], accompanying her to [study], and taking her out for [walk], your relationship may become closer and closer, but it may also drift away. Take good care of your doll, and try to improve her [happiness] and [obedience]!

◆ Game features

◇ 16 basic CGs, including more than 180 differentials and 9 motion CGs

◇ Rich game text: ca. 80,000

◇ One main female character

◇ A casual simulation game that is relaxing and fun

◇ Game ending: 4 types

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, General Mature Content or BDSM.
All characters are over the age of 20.

◆ Story

Li Yuan made a wish on the night of the meteor rain and unexpectedly gave life to his sex doll, Meng. At first, Meng could only talk but could not move, and her body was still made of silicone. Under Li Yuan's attentive care, Meng's body could move, but to become a real person, the two of them still needed to continue to work hard.

After coming to life, Meng would inevitably develop many human characteristics. She would feel sorry for Li Yuan, who worked hard at work, but she would also imitate the people on TV to swear, be addicted to the Internet, etc. The way they are dealt with would determine the outcome of the two.
